properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:55AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold affecting Catoosa County

Cartecay River near East Ellijay affecting Gilmer County

Coosawattee River near Ellijay affecting Gilmer County


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold.
* From this morning until further notice.
* At 930 AM Thursday the stage was 15.0 feet...and rising.
* Flood stage is 15 feet.
* At 15 feet... Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins
in the woodlands and fields along the creek upstream and
downstream from the gage on the U.S. Highway 41 or Nashville
Street bridge. The flood water will expand to inundate the
entire area under the bridge. Minor flooding of the natural
floodplain will also occur upstream of the gage between
Interstate 75 and U.S. Highway 41 or Nashville Street.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
